import { Component, OnInit, inject } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-dashboard', templateUrl: './dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./dashboard.component.css'] }) export class DashboardComponent{ showCreateCardForm: boolean = false; OpenCreateCardForm(){ this.showCreateCardForm = true; } CloseCreateCardForm(){ this.showCreateCardForm = false; } }
